item.title: By: Matt
item.dc:creator: Matt
item.description: <p>Mainly the Gambia, with a foray over the border to Senegal on a trip down the river. It was a family holiday in 1987.</p>
item.content:encoded: Mainly the Gambia, with a foray over the border to Senegal on a trip down the river. It was a family holiday in 1987.

item.title: By: Ed Brill
item.dc:creator: Ed Brill
item.description: <p>interesting little bit of red in Africa...is it Senegal? If so, tell us more about that!</p>
item.content:encoded: interesting little bit of red in Africa…is it Senegal? If so, tell us more about that!
